articles.title: Is Paraguay set to make bitcoin legal? Don't bet on it - Reuters
articles.description: In the wake of El Salvador's dramatic move to make bitcoin a legal tender, a world first, the internet has been buzzing with rumors that another Latin American country may be set to follow in its footsteps: Paraguay.
